name: Galactic Girl and the Puzzle Planets
name_original: Galactic Girl and the Puzzle Planets
description:
Join Galactic Girl as she crosses the cosmos to explore the Puzzle Planet system. Can she solve the mysteries of these uncharted worlds?

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

We recommend playing the post jam version. It's the same exact same thing but with some minor changes to make the experience smoother (double jump and moving platforms improved).

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Instructions

WASD for movement

Space to jump in space

O to go IN/OUT of the suit

P to enter planets

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Game done for Ludumdare38 by:

Gerard Belenguer - Unity Dev

Victor Alcazar - Unity Dev

Rory Given - Music and Sound

Filipe de Andrade - Art
